name: Kagamine Rin "Original"(F 2nd)
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Music》 characters is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks. if a card named "Kokoro" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two 《Music》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Kagamine Rin "Reactor"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Music》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Roshin Yukai" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, put it into your opponent's stock, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your memory.

name: Kagamine Len "Original"(F 2nd)
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. name: Colorful x Melody

text: 【CONT】 You can put up to eight cards with the same card name as this card in your deck. 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Two-Sided Lovers" is in your climax area, and if there are no markers underneath this card, you may choose a card named "Hatsune Miku "Conflicted"" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When a card named "Two-Sided Lovers" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and there is a marker underneath this card, choose up to two 《Music》 characters in your waiting room, and put them into your stock in any order.

name: The Intense Voice of Hatsune Miku

幸せ溢れる　歌　口ずさもう

name: MEIKO "Fluffy Coat"
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."

name: Megurine Luka "Recruiter"
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card from your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck.

name: Hatsune Miku "Avant-garde"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Akatsuki Arrival" is in your climax area, and you do not have any other "Megurine Luka "Successor"", this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Akatsuki Arrival" is in your climax area, and you have another "Megurine Luka "Successor"", until end of turn, this card gets +8000 power and +1 soul, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your memory.

name: Megurine Luka "Successor"
text: 【CONT】 Memory If a card named "Hatsune Miku "Avant-garde"" is in your memory, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Akatsuki Arrival" is in your climax area, and you do not have any other "Hatsune Miku "Avant-garde"", this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Akatsuki Arrival" is in your climax area, and you have another "Hatsune Miku "Avant-garde"", this card gets +3500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Blackjack
text: Brainstorm Reveal five cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax revealed among those cards. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
制約の犬に　今ナイフを突き刺して
現実を睨む手前　『もう一回』

name: The World is Mine
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
世界でいちばんおひめさま
そういう扱い心得てよね

name: Double Lariat
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
半径6300キロはこの手の届く距離
今ならできる気がしますので離れていてください

name: Break It, Break It!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
壊せ壊せ壊せ壊せ
壊せ壊せ壊せいらない壊せ

name: Luka Luka ★ Night Fever
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText:
私はここに居るから
少しでも視線を逸らしちゃダメダメよ☆

name: Akatsuki Arrival
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
“覚えてる？”　「覚えているよ」
「“キミと歩んだあの日々を”」

name: Akatsuki Arrival
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
“振り向かないで。ここはまだ道の途中だから”
前を向こう　辛いけどキミが望むのならば……！

name: "To Wherever You May Be" Hatsune Miku
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Music》 characters in front of this card get +1 level and +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: かがやく、はじける、未来へ。

name: KAITO "V3"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Hatsune Miku "Rosa Bianca"
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】,if a card named "Cantarella ～Grace Edition～" is in your climax area, you may draw a card.

name: Hatsune Miku "Rosa Bianca"
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】,if a card named "Cantarella ～Grace Edition～" is in your climax area, you may draw a card.

name: KAITO "Rosa Blue"
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Cantarella ～Grace Edition～" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: KAITO "Rosa Blue"
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Cantarella ～Grace Edition～" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: KAITO "Original"(F 2nd)
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "KAITO & MEIKO "Original"" or "KAITO "V3"" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: KAITO "Shigure"
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: KAITO "Holiday"
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if the number of characters your opponent has is three or less, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power.

name: Kagamine Rin "Raspberry"
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to another open position of your center stage.

name: Kagamine Rin "Raspberry Fox"
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to another open position of your center stage.

name: Kagamine Len "Indigo"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and until end of turn, that character gets +1 level and +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other characters you have with "Rin(リン)" or "Len(レン)" in its card name. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a blue card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

name: Kagamine Len "Indigo Fox"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and until end of turn, that character gets +1 level and +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other characters you have with "Rin(リン)" or "Len(レン)" in its card name. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a blue card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

name: Hatsune Miku "Vintage Dress"
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Romeo and Cinderella" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other characters, and until the end of your opponent's next turn, that character gets +1500 power and this card gets +1500 power.

name: KAITO "Originator"
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Erase or Zero" is in your climax area, until end of turn, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck."

name: Kagamine Len "Eraser"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Music》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When a card named "Erase or Zero" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and move that character to another open position of your opponent's stage.

name: KAITO "Violet"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Thousand Year Solo (DIVA Edit)" is in your climax area, choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters. That character cannot 【Stand】 during your opponent's next stand phase.

name: Hatsune Miku "Demons and the Dead"
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +4000 power and your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". (Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)

name: KAITO "White Blazer"
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 0 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.)

name: Hatsune Miku "Hana-Kotoba"
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Hatsune Miku "Kasha"
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Hatsune Miku "Regret"
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other "Hatsune Miku "Marionette"", this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When another of your "Hatsune Miku "Marionette"" is put into your waiting room from the stage, put this card into your waiting room.

name: Hatsune Miku "Marionette"
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other "Hatsune Miku "Regret"", this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When another of your "Hatsune Miku "Regret"" is put into your waiting room from the stage, put this card into your waiting room.

name: Hatsune Miku "Marionette"
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other "Hatsune Miku "Regret"", this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When another of your "Hatsune Miku "Regret"" is put into your waiting room from the stage, put this card into your waiting room.

name: Hatsune Miku "Moonlight Butterfly"
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may choose one of your "Kagamine Rin "Sunflower"", and put this card face down underneath that card as a marker.

name: Kagamine Rin "Sunflower"
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +5000 power.

name: Kagamine Len "Thorned Rose"
text: 【AUTO】 [Put one of your other "Hatsune Miku "Moonlight Butterfly"" from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Wintry Winds
text: Search your deck for up to one character with "KAITO" in its card name and up to one character with "MEIKO" or "MEIKO(メイコ)" in its card name, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText:
留まる事なく　直走る
かわいた唄と　つがゐこがらし

name: Knife
text: Search your deck for up to one card named "Kagamine Len"Thorned Rose"" and up to one card named "Kagamine Rin"Sunflower"" and up to one card named "Hatsune Miku"Moonlight Butterfly"", reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavorText:
いずれ　剥がれてしまうならば
その手で　縛めて

name: Cantarella ～Grace Edition～
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
たとえば深い茂みの中滑り込ませて
繋いだ汗の香りにただ侵されそう

name: Romeo and Cinderella
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw a card.)
flavorText:
全部見せてよ
あなたにならば見せてあげる私の…

name: Thousand Year Solo (DIVA Edit)
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
ガラスの瞳に映るこの空は
どんなまやかしだろう

name: Erase or Zero
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
でも、結局ボクら　何か変われた？
こたえは　「…もう一度。」　さえ　消せなくて・・・

name: Love-Hate
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Clockwork Clown
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Pinky Swear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3 soul until end of turn.

name: Deepening "DIVA" Hatsune Miku
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card isput into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as REST)
